summary:
I wanted a more decent version of Aranea and so ive made it, uncapped her to level 79, changed the hair and face, thats about it.
Included two versions, Robed or Naked, your choice.

I also removed her summon spells as they always got in my way and she already is super powerful without them anyways.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a more decent version of Aranea and so ive made it, uncapped her to level 79, changed the hair and face, thats about it.
Included two versions, Robed or Naked, your choice.

I also removed her summon spells as they always got in my way and she already is super powerful without them anyways.

V3 fix the hair duplicate.

Enjoy!
Remzy

Installation:
Drop everything in the skyrim folder - enable the module using your favorite module loader.

Requirement:
ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/[/url]

Uninstallation:
Delete the module, or remove from the module loader, mod is cosmetic so nothing should change aside from jenessa's look.

Known Issue:
-

Credits:
Apachii for the hair, great stuff as always.
---------------

Skyrim script thingy, very important to mod your game
Also known as SKSE
